title.rendered: User-Generated Content Brings Creators, Users Closer and Blurs Promotion With Consumption [Keith Jopling] – Hypebot

content.rendered:
“It is important for music content owners to start imagining UGC as another format or channel for the delivery of music rather than simply as promotion or audience development.”

Read the full article by Hypebot here.
